text: "Mind Disease" is a song written by the Harrow-based band Ritual. The song was released by Red Flame Records as a single in October 1982. It was produced by the band and engineered by Chris Stone. ==Picture sleeve== The front of the picture sleeve featured artwork by Simon Cohen, while the artwork on the back was done by Ritual guitarist Jamie Stewart. ==Formats and track listing== *7": Red Flame / RF 712 (United Kingdom) #"Mind Disease" #"Nine" ==Personnel== *Errol Blyth - vocals *Mark Bond - bass guitar *Steve Pankhurst - saxophone *Ray Mondo - drums *Jamie Stewart - guitars ==References== Omnibus Press. . * * ==أنظر ايضا== Hip hop music R&B; Songs Romantic (song) ==External links== *Ritual at Discogs Category:1982 singles Category:1982 songs
